00039 void RequestHandlerAttrDel::run() {
00040   ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00041   size_t remaining = m_event_ptr->message_len - 2;
00042   const uint8_t *msg = m_event_ptr->message + 2;
00043 
00044   try {
00045     uint64_t handle = decode_i64(&msg, &remaining);
00046     const char *name = decode_vstr(&msg, &remaining);
00047 
00048     m_master->attr_del(&cb, m_session_id, handle, name);
00049   }
00050   catch (Exception &e) {
00051     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00052     cb.error(e.code(), "Error handling ATTRDEL message");
00053   }
00054 }
